title: American Horror Story: Apocalypse OFFICIAL TRAILER
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Am I the only one who is shocked that Myrtle is back??
Its funny how this "preview trailer" almost makes you think that Madison could be the vilain of the season xD
" I bet youd thought you've seen the last of me? "
I personally am hyped for Frances Conroy's return as Myrtle and hopefully Moira 😍🤩🤯😇🙊🤞🏻
Is this the actual official trailer for season 8 of AHS
